document_data.mainbody:
he All Faiths Altar was a shrine in the city of Loudwater in the Delimbiyr Vale in the mid-to-late 14 century DR. It was open to worshipers of all non-evil faiths (with Bane, Cyric, Malar, and such excluded).
It was a large shrine.
Poor travelers sometimes slept in the shrines forechancel, usually when the weather was bad. However, pilgrims and wandering priests were permitted to stay no more than a tenday.
